comments.body: Could you make this `THttpCallArg::CreateEngine()` or similar? This pattern (constructor taking its owner) is so rare that it's surprising me again and again. It's just really bad to have `new` without assigning the result.

Main problem - I do not like to make this methods public.
THttpCallArg is central class of http requests processing and one should not provide easy methods to confuse users.

Ok, I create THttpCallArg::CreateWSEngine method. Here is commit:

https://github.com/linev/root/commit/09fcb4ceb7f7ba81fac3dc4a2a230b1eefd7f424

I will submit it with other PR
